text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Indeed… I've been thinking until dawn
for the past few days…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But because of that, I've come up with 
something…! 
Proposed class goals for next month, 100 
of them!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now we just need to achieve one――

As class president, she cares about her
class so much that she doesn't seem to
be sleeping very well…
